SEARCH
Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.hofmaad
Package view

Class SimulationWorkspaceView

java.lang.Object
view.SimulationWorkspaceView
public class SimulationWorkspaceView extends Object
Represents the main workspace of a network simulation environment. This class manages the graphical user interface components and interactions for simulating network devices and connections.

  • Constructor Summary

      first - the first network device
      second - the second network device
      Returns:
      the connection line if found, otherwise null

    • setupPlacedDeviceEvents

      public void setupPlacedDeviceEvents(NetworkDeviceView networkDeviceView)
      Sets up event handling for network devices that have been placed on the simulation workspace. Includes setting up events for clicking, dragging, and hovering over the device.
      Parameters:
      networkDeviceView - the view representation of the network device

    • addConnectionLine

      public void addConnectionLine(NetworkDeviceView startDeviceView, NetworkDeviceView endDeviceView, String middleLabel, String startLabel, String endLabel)
      Adds a connection line between two network devices and updates the graphical representation.
      Parameters:
      startDeviceView - the starting device view
      endDeviceView - the ending device view
      middleLabel - the label in the middle of the connection line
      startLabel - the label near the start of the connection line
      endLabel - the label near the end of the connection line
